tool.name: NetworkDatasetRandomPoints
tool.displayname: Create Random Points on a Network Dataset

param.name: network_dataset
param.dialogReference: An existing Network Data Set to which we will create random points on.

param.name: out_location
param.displayname: Path to Output Random Point Feature Class
param.dialogReference: Path which contains the output feature class representing the random points

param.name: output_point_feature_class
param.displayname: Output Random Point Feature Class Name
param.dialogReference: The feature class that represents the random points

param.name: use_field
param.displayname: Use a Data Field for Point Generation
param.dialogReference: Check this field to use a Data Field for Point Generation.

param.name: num_points_field
param.dialogReference: Field of dataset that has the number of points to generate.

tool.summary: Creates a specified number of points randomly on a network dataset as a feature class.
tool.usage:
See parameters for Required and Optional Fields.

Outputs a series of random points on a network dataset.

idCitation.resTitle: Create Random Points on a Network Dataset

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Bus Drivers Ben Botto, Kian Faroughi, Kenneth Spence Kevin Choe
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Creates a specified number of points randomly on a network dataset as a feature class.
